meanings: [형용사] only, sole (※명사 앞에서만 쓰임) (강조하여) one and only
the one and only friend one has
be the only one who survived
the sole survivor from the shipwreck

meanings.meaning: be well, ideally, uniquely, better, etc. placed for something/to do something

examples.korean: the sole/only survivor of the massacre 발음듣기 그 대량 학살의 유일한 생존자 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the sole/only survivor of the massacre 발음

examples.korean: A plain necklace was her only adornment. 발음듣기 수수한 목걸이 하나가 그녀의 유일한 장신구였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A plain necklace was her only adornment. 발음

examples.korean: The eldest son is the family’s sole provider. 발음듣기 장남이 그 가족의 유일한 부양자이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The eldest son is the family’s sole provider. 발음

examples.korean: Going to the theatre is our only extravagance. 발음듣기 극장에 가는 것은 우리의 유일한 사치이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Going to the theatre is our only extravagance. 발음

examples.korean: My only gripe about the hotel was the food. 발음듣기 그 호텔에 대한 나의 유일한 불만은 음식이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My only gripe about the hotel was the food. 발음
